Summary Note:
The Relationship Manager (RM) first met Binder Wagner Schwarz at a charity gala in Vienna. They had a long conversation about their mutual interest in philanthropy and decided to stay in touch.
Having worked for over 43 years, Binder Wagner Schwarz brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
He was impressed by Julius Baer's global presence and expertise in private banking, leading to the decision to join.
Family Background: Binder Wagner Schwarz and Fiona tied the knot in 1987. They are proud parents of 3 children: Graf, Sophia and Fiona.
Education Background:
Binder graduated from HAK/HAS Grödig in 1977.
Binder completed his university studies at University of Innsbruck in 1982.
Occupation History:
Binder Wagner Schwarz is a 66 year old and comes from Austria.
Binder Wagner Schwarz began his professional journey as a Drilling Engineer at Austrian Energy Agency in 1982, laying the foundation for future success.
At Austrian Energy Agency, he held the position of Reservoir Engineer from 1989 to 1991, making significant contributions to the organization.
At Austrian Energy Agency, he worked as a Operations Manager from 1992 till retirement, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 1020000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He owns villa in Graz, where he resides. It is worth 1621000 EUR.

He purchased townhouse in Mödling, where he spends his holidays. It is valued at 1130000 EUR.
Moreover, he has invested in additional property in Innsbruck, giving possiblity for generating additional income. The villa is valued at 2300000 EUR.

He does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Binder as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
